children.string: [Episode 1: Everybody can be a mystic | A conversation with Therese Taylor-Stinson](https://www.christiancentury.org/blog-post/contemplating-now/episode-1-everybody-can-be-mystic-conversation-therese-taylor-stinson) #[[church/theology]] #[[inoreader]]
Excerpt:: “So that contemplation can be whole, it must consist of both inward solitude and reflection, and an outward response to the situations in which we find ourselves present and awake.
Excerpt:: What’s the most disliked religion in the contemporary United States? Until recently, “Islam” would have been the runaway answer to this question.
